cpm.title: Mondkalender 2026 – Your Moon Phase Guide
cpm.subtitle: Live in Harmony with the Moon
cpm.description: Use the Mondkalender 2026 for optimal planning. Discover the best times for haare schneiden (hair cutting), gardening, and health. Your digital companion for the entire year.

cpc.title: Mondkalender Haare Schneiden – Perfect Timing
cpc.subtitle: Hair cutting according to moon calendar
cpc.description: Haare schneiden im Mondkalender: Find the best days for haircuts and hair care. The moon influences hair growth – use moon phases optimally for healthy, strong hair.
cpc.placeholder: Find the ideal day for your haircut...

cpa.title: Garden According to Moon Calendar
cpa.subtitle: Planting, Sowing and Harvesting at the Right Time
cpa.description: Plan your gardening according to the moon calendar. Optimal times for sowing, planting and harvesting. The moon supports plant growth and soil care.

ctr.title: Health and Wellness in Moon Rhythm
ctr.subtitle: Body and Mind in Harmony
ctr.description: Use the moon calendar for your health. Find optimal times for wellness, fasting, sports and relaxation. The moon influences our body and wellbeing.

roi.title: Mondkalender 2026 zum Ausdrucken (Printable)
roi.subtitle: Your Personal Wall Calendar
roi.description: Download the Mondkalender 2026 zum Ausdrucken. Practical annual calendar with all moon phases, zodiac signs and favorable days for your daily life. Perfect for home or office.

youtube.title: Daily Moon Calendar – Today
youtube.subtitle: Current Moon Phase and Daily Recommendations
youtube.description: What does the moon say today? Get daily recommendations for haare schneiden, gardening, health and more. Your personal moon calendar for every day.
